author: luckygingle123
title: Only LEGO brick master set that has minifigure
review: I just got this set in the mail. It was cool! Not bad. I am so happy.   I love the trap! I have dagger now! The prince comes with one sword. No sword holder. trap activates by you pull-ing a stick.

author: TooMuchLEGO
title: Good set
review: 20017 is a Brickmaster set only available for BrickMaster customers or if you got the Best of Brickmaster 2010 (in my case). This set was actually quite good though small. Dastan is a pretty good figure who is pretty similar to the actor he is based on, though unlike his other minifigures he is scabbard-less. Two snakes are also included to injure Dastan. I thought that it was cool how you got two Daggers of Time- for time paradoxes, I guess? The actually set part also pays homage to the game the movie was based on too! Anyway, it's a good set with good playability, and if you find for cheap online, I recommend getting it.
